alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dixie County through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cross City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Shamrock, Hines, Jonesboro, Cross City Airport and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
